unchanged_regions.justification: Landscape, boy's torso and hair unchanged; only arm regions show editing artifacts and color shift.

global_consistency.justification: Overall desert scene, lighting, and composition preserved but arm artifacts disrupt consistent appearance.

identity_preservation.justification: Hair, clothing, body silhouette remain recognizable; subject identity preserved despite arm reconstruction.

scale_realism.justification: Arms appear disproportionately long and thin compared to torso and legs, unrealistic scale.

spatial_relationship.justification: Arms detach with visible gaps at shoulders, breaking correct spatial attachment to torso.

texture_and_detail.justification: Arm skin textures smoother and inconsistent; hard edges and missing shoulder detail noticeable.

image_quality.justification: Sharp landscape but editing introduced jagged edges and cut-out artifacts around arm regions.

color_and_lighting.justification: Arm tones slightly brighter, shadows missing near joints, lighting mismatch with torso and background.

seamlessness.justification: Visible hard seams and black circular cutouts at shoulder joints prevent natural transitions.

alignment.justification: Instruction followed: both hands raised outward; execution shows raised hands despite visible artifacts.

completeness.justification: Hands are raised but editing left incomplete shoulder joins and missing continuity.

plausibility.justification: Result looks unnatural with floating, detached arms; not plausible in real-world anatomy.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background landscape, clothing, and head remain unchanged; only the boy's arms were modified.

global_consistency.justification: Overall scene color and composition preserved, but arm outlines and fill disrupt visual harmony.

identity_preservation.justification: Boy's hair, body shape, and outfit match ground truth, preserving the subject's identity.

scale_realism.justification: Arms are lengthened plausibly relative to the body, though proportions are slightly exaggerated.

spatial_relationship.justification: Extended arms remain attached and oriented to the shoulders, maintaining original spatial relationships.

texture_and_detail.justification: Edited arms lack skin texture and show flat fill with heavy outline, inconsistent with surrounding detail.

image_quality.justification: Noticeable jagged black outlines and posterized fill on the arms introduce visible artifacts.

color_and_lighting.justification: Arm fill is darker and flat with black borders; lighting and shadows do not match the scene.

seamlessness.justification: Hard edges and contrasting outlines around the arms create obvious seams with the torso.

alignment.justification: Hands are clearly stretched outward on both sides, matching the instruction to extend the boy's hands.

completeness.justification: Both arms have been extended and positioned outward; the requested change is fully present.

plausibility.justification: Extended pose is physically plausible, but cartoonish outlines and flat fill make the edit look artificial.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background landscape and terrain remain consistent; only the subject's limb area differs noticeably.

global_consistency.justification: Composition and scene preserved, but overall color temperature and lighting on subject differ slightly.

identity_preservation.justification: Same person, hairstyle, clothing, and facial/head features preserved between images.

scale_realism.justification: Body proportions relative to the environment remain realistic and consistent with the ground truth.

spatial_relationship.justification: Subject placement and horizon alignment match; relative distances to rock formations unchanged.

texture_and_detail.justification: Shirt fabric, skin texture, and surrounding sand detail remain coherent and finely rendered.

image_quality.justification: Edited image is sharp with low noise and no obvious compression artifacts or blurring.

color_and_lighting.justification: General lighting matches, but the edited image exhibits warmer tones and altered shadowing on the subject.

seamlessness.justification: No visible boundaries or splicing; subject integrates smoothly into the background.

alignment.justification: Arms remain at the subject's sides; hands are not stretched out as requested.

completeness.justification: The key edit—extending the boy's hands outward—was not performed.

plausibility.justification: Pose and scene appear natural and believable, despite failing to implement the specified arm extension.

unchanged_regions.justification: Desert background matches ground truth with same roads and buttes unchanged.

global_consistency.justification: Photorealistic person replaced by flat cartoon, disrupting original photographic style.

identity_preservation.justification: Original man replaced by cartoon character; facial features and clothing differ entirely.

scale_realism.justification: Cartoon figure sized similarly to original; but shadow and proportions appear simplified.

spatial_relationship.justification: Character placed where original boy stood; horizon alignment and ground contact match.

texture_and_detail.justification: Flat colors and thick outlines contrast with detailed desert texture and lighting.

image_quality.justification: Edited cartoon remains sharp, high-resolution, and free of compression artifacts or blurring.

color_and_lighting.justification: Bold flat colors and simple shadowing don't match desert's warm, directional lighting.

seamlessness.justification: Hard outline around character creates abrupt transition against photographic background.

alignment.justification: Character's arms are fully outstretched and clearly visible, matching the instruction precisely.

completeness.justification: Arms are stretched, but original photographic subject replaced by a cartoon, making the edit only partially complete.

plausibility.justification: Cartoon figure lacks realistic integration: proportions, shading, and interaction with ground look unnatural.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background, ground, and sky were fully repainted into a painterly style, not left unchanged.

global_consistency.justification: Composition and layout preserved, but overall color palette and style drastically changed to a painting.

identity_preservation.justification: Boy's hair, clothing, and pose remain recognizably the same despite stylized brushwork.

scale_realism.justification: Arms and hands are proportionate to the boy's body and environment, appearing realistically scaled.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy, foreground vegetation, and distant buttes retain original spatial positions and distances.

texture_and_detail.justification: Painted brushstrokes are consistent within the edit but lose photographic fine detail of skin and fabric.

image_quality.justification: Edited image is sharp and free of compression artifacts or obvious rendering glitches.

color_and_lighting.justification: Lighting and shadows are coherent within the painted scene, matching the new color scheme.

seamlessness.justification: Transitions between the boy and background are smoothly rendered in the same painterly style.

alignment.justification: Boy's arms and hands are clearly stretched outward, matching the edit instruction precisely.

completeness.justification: Both arms and hands were fully extended and symmetrically adjusted across the image.

plausibility.justification: Result is a believable painted scene; stretched pose looks natural and physically plausible.

unchanged_regions.justification: Landscape composition and elements remain, but widespread neon false-color affects previously unchanged regions' appearance noticeably.

global_consistency.justification: Overall photographic style disrupted by uniform neon false-color mapping, altering original tones and visual coherence across the image.

identity_preservation.justification: Subject's silhouette, clothing folds, hairstyle, and posture preserved despite color remapping, keeping core identity recognizable.

scale_realism.justification: Arms, hands, and torso proportions remain consistent with body and surrounding terrain, maintaining realistic scale relationships.

spatial_relationship.justification: Arm placements and limb connections to shoulders are coherent; spatial relation between person and landscape unchanged.

texture_and_detail.justification: Natural skin and fabric textures lost to posterized neon gradients; fine details in edited regions are diminished.

image_quality.justification: Image remains sharp with preserved edges and no blurring, though color artifacts dominate appearance.

color_and_lighting.justification: Color mapping and lighting on subject do not match ambient scene illumination or shadow directions.

seamlessness.justification: Transitions between edited limbs and body are geometrically clean but color discontinuity creates noticeable seams.

alignment.justification: Edit follows instruction: boy's hands clearly stretched outward compared to typical relaxed pose.

completeness.justification: Requested hand-stretching applied fully; however unintended global recoloring constitutes an extraneous change.

plausibility.justification: Pose is physically plausible, but extreme false-coloring makes scene visually implausible as a real photograph.

unchanged_regions.justification: Foreground rocks, viewpoint, and path differ; many background and foreground regions were altered unnecessarily.

global_consistency.justification: Color grading similar but composition and camera angle changed, reducing overall consistency between images.

identity_preservation.justification: Same hair, shirt, and general body features preserved; person remains recognizable despite posture changes.

scale_realism.justification: Boy's size remains proportional to mesas and foreground rocks, maintaining realistic scale relationships.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy relocated onto a central rock and closer to camera; spatial relationships with background are changed.

texture_and_detail.justification: Skin, shirt, and ground textures retain detail and match surrounding sharpness and grain.

image_quality.justification: Image is sharp with no obvious compression artifacts or noise in edited regions.

color_and_lighting.justification: Warm desert tones and lighting direction are consistent between images, matching shadow directions.

seamlessness.justification: Visible edge differences at waist and foot contact show imperfect blending with the background.

alignment.justification: Edited image does not show fully stretched arms as in ground truth; instruction not followed.

completeness.justification: Arms remain partially raised instead of fully stretched; edit is incomplete.

plausibility.justification: Resulting pose and scene look physically plausible and natural, without anatomical errors.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background changed from desert mesas to underwater coral; large landscape regions were altered visibly.

global_consistency.justification: Overall scene color, environment, and mood shifted from warm desert tones to cool underwater blue.

identity_preservation.justification: The boy's hair, shirt, shorts, and body posture remain visually consistent between images.

scale_realism.justification: Boy's size relative to nearby rock and seafloor elements appears proportionate and realistic.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy remains standing on the same rock edge; relative position preserved despite background replacement.

texture_and_detail.justification: Arm and hand textures retain skin detail and clothing texture consistent with the rest of the figure.

image_quality.justification: Edited image is sharp with no obvious compression artifacts or blurring around the subject.

color_and_lighting.justification: Lighting on the boy retains warm tones while ambient underwater light is cool, causing mismatch.

seamlessness.justification: Subject compositing is mostly clean but edges and lighting reveal the background swap.

alignment.justification: The boy's hands are clearly stretched outward, matching the edit instruction and ground truth pose.

completeness.justification: Both arms are fully extended upward outward, fulfilling the requested hand-stretching edit.

plausibility.justification: Boy in casual clothes standing above a coral seafloor appears physically unlikely and inconsistent.

unchanged_regions.justification: Desert landscape, buttes, and ground textures remain visually consistent between images.

global_consistency.justification: Overall composition and viewpoint preserved; colors and horizon align with original scene.

identity_preservation.justification: Same person retained: identical hair, shirt, shorts, and back-facing pose visible in both images.

scale_realism.justification: Subject scale relative to landscape and nearby shrub remains realistic and proportionate.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy's position on the ridge and distance to foreground shrub are consistent across images.

texture_and_detail.justification: Skin, clothing folds, and ground textures around edited arm match surrounding detail.

image_quality.justification: Edited image is sharp with no obvious compression artifacts or blur from editing.

color_and_lighting.justification: Lighting and skin tones mostly match, though the extended left arm appears slightly brighter.

seamlessness.justification: Transition at the extended arm is generally natural, with minor blending differences near shoulder.

alignment.justification: Only the left hand is stretched outward; the right hand remains lowered, not matching instruction fully.

completeness.justification: Instruction to stretch hands not fully executed—right arm remains unextended while left is stretched.

plausibility.justification: Resulting pose (one arm extended) appears physically plausible and coherent within the scene.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background has significant blur and grain compared to ground truth, indicating alterations beyond intended region.

global_consistency.justification: Layout preserved but color cast and heavy grain alter overall style and appearance.

identity_preservation.justification: Same person, clothing, and posture visible despite blur; facial and hair features preserved.

scale_realism.justification: Arms, body, and surroundings maintain realistic proportions relative to the scene.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy's position and landscape elements remain aligned with ground truth perspective.

texture_and_detail.justification: Edited arms and surrounding areas show heavy noise and loss of fine detail.

image_quality.justification: Image is noisy and blurred overall, reducing sharpness and visual clarity.

color_and_lighting.justification: Strong warm/orange tint and flattened shadows differ from original lighting.

seamlessness.justification: No visible cut edges; edited regions blend through uniform grain and blur.

alignment.justification: Boy's hands are stretched outward as instructed, matching ground truth pose.

completeness.justification: Both arms are extended; edit applied fully across the subject.

plausibility.justification: Pose and scene remain believable; no anatomical or physical inconsistencies.

unchanged_regions.justification: Background changed from close-up cliff overlook to wide desert panorama; many original foreground elements removed or relocated.

global_consistency.justification: Composition, viewpoint, and scale differ dramatically; overall visual layout and framing are not preserved.

identity_preservation.justification: Person appears as a tiny distant silhouette; facial features and clothing details are lost compared to reference.

scale_realism.justification: Subject scale changed from close-up to tiny background figure, inconsistent with original scene depth and proportions.

spatial_relationship.justification: Boy relocated from foreground overlook to far background; relative placement to rocks and path is altered.

texture_and_detail.justification: Arm and clothing textures lack fine detail in edited image; distant figure shows no consistent textural continuity.

image_quality.justification: Edited image overall is sharp, but the edited region is low-detail and loses recognizable features.

color_and_lighting.justification: Desert tones and lighting remain similar between images, maintaining consistent color temperature and shadow direction.

seamlessness.justification: Transition is abrupt; pasted distant figure and changed background create visible compositing mismatch with foreground.

alignment.justification: Instruction partially met: figure's arms appear raised in edited image, but pose and proximity differ from target.

completeness.justification: Only a distant arm-raising silhouette exists; original close-up pose and surrounding details were not fully reproduced.

plausibility.justification: Result is a plausible desert scene; however, edit deviates from intended foreground pose, reducing task relevance.

unchanged_regions.justification: Desert, mesas, horizon and ground details remain visually identical between images.

global_consistency.justification: Photorealistic background contrasts strongly with a smooth CG mannequin, breaking overall style.

identity_preservation.justification: Original boy replaced by featureless mannequin; hair, clothing, and facial features are absent.

scale_realism.justification: Mannequin height, foot placement, and shadow scale align plausibly with surrounding rocks and bushes.

spatial_relationship.justification: Figure remains at the same cliff edge and maintains the same spatial relation to background landmarks.

texture_and_detail.justification: Edited region shows uniform smooth surface with no fabric, skin, or hair detail present.

image_quality.justification: Edited figure is sharp and artifact-free but appears artificially rendered compared to photo background.

color_and_lighting.justification: Warm directional lighting and shadow on the mannequin roughly match scene illumination despite material differences.

seamlessness.justification: Crisp edges but material and texture mismatch make the composite visually obvious.

alignment.justification: Hands are stretched outward as requested, but the original boy was not preserved.

completeness.justification: Arm extension completed, but original subject's appearance and clothing were not retained.

plausibility.justification: Featureless mannequin in a realistic scene appears unnatural and undermines real-world plausibility.
